016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates.letsencrypt;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019
020import java.net.URI;
021
022public record LetsEncryptConfiguration(Configuration configuration) {
023
024    public String getURL()
025    {
026        return configuration.getString("url").orElseThrow(()->new IllegalArgumentException("Missing letsencrypt.url"));
027    }
028
029    public URI getAccountLocation() {
030        return configuration.getString("location").map(URI::create).orElseThrow(()->new IllegalArgumentException("Missing letsencrypt.location"));
031    }
032
033/*
034    public Map<String, String> getCertificateLocations() {
035        return configuration.getObjectAs("certificates", on -> JsonElement.toMap(on, JsonNode::textValue)).orElseThrow();
036    }
037*/
038}
